issue.title: [Flight][C++] Flight DoGet doesn't expose server error message
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5095](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5095). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If a server sends an error back in DoGet before sending the schema, the Flight client will report only "no data in Flight stream", not the actual error message.
